metadata.synopsis: Shadowheart's response to SHA_VoiceOfShar_AD_Baptism if she is nearby. Reaffirming her dedication to become a Dark Justiciar

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Almost there. I will not fail you, my lady.
